This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account. You will need your Campus Wide Login (CWL) to login to your course at https://www.elearning.ubc.ca/ .
Nursing, Biomedical Engineers, and unclassified students or visitor should complete the Application Form available online at http://www.internationalsurgery.ubc.ca/.or contact elenor.ball-banting@ubc.ca.
courseName: Surgical Care in Humanitarian Disaster Response
description: Online course. Examines response to humanitarian disasters. Includes case models of surgical care responses and strategies to move from relief to recovery.
